snippet: Researchers are examining the notes made by the 18th-century naturalist Peter Collinson in a book about London; pictures of Bettie Page are featured in two sales; the dollworks of Morton Bartlett are in a show.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; scholars pour over notes by 18th-century naturalist Peter Collinson found in a 1739 history of London that was purchased by the Library Company, a research center in Philadelphia; trove of pinup photos by Bunny Yeager and Irving Klaw will be sold at auction; dolls and photos by Morton Bartlett will be on display at the Hamburger Bahnhof museum in Berlin through October.
lead_paragraph: Researchers are examining the notes made by the 18th-century naturalist Peter Collinson in a book about London; pictures of Bettie Page are featured in two sales; the dollworks of Morton Bartlett are in a show.

headline.seo: A Naturalist’s Notes on London; Bettie Page Photos
headline.main: A Naturalist’s Notes on London; Bettie Page Photos
